title: HIS FINAL STAND: Desperation Can Send The Sanest Man Crazy
description: Jack Travis attempts to settle a debt for his brother, doing two little jobs for notorious gangster Marco Franks.After being double-crossed by Franks, Jack goes on the run, wanted for the killings of two men and a cop.As the police catch up with him, he takes an officer hostage in a disused warehouse where, one way or another, his fate will be sealed...
author: Matt Karpe
